Container.Name: wh-teldrive
Container.Overview: Telegram Drive is a powerful utility that enables you to organise your telegram files and much more.
Container.Requires: Teldrive requires: - A Telegram account with 1 bot from @BotFather. - A PostgreSQL database with "PGroonga" & "pgvector". (e.g. use the "wh-teldrive-postgres16" template) - "session.db" & "config.toml" must be created and mapped to the container before starting Teldrive. "config.toml" example file: https://github.com/divyam234/teldrive/blob/main/config.sample.toml

Config.Name: Teldrive web UI port
Config.Description: The TCP port Teldrive listens on.

Config.Name: Teldrive session database
Config.Description: The location where Teldrive stores its sessions.

Config.Name: Teldrive config
Config.Description: The location where Teldrive stores its config.
